volunteer_opportunities.title: Food Bank Volunteer
volunteer_opportunities.description: Help sort and distribute food donations at a local food bank
volunteer_opportunities.requirements: Must be able to lift up to 50 lbs

volunteer_opportunities.title: Animal Shelter Volunteer
volunteer_opportunities.description: Walk dogs, play with cats, and help keep the shelter clean
volunteer_opportunities.requirements: Must be comfortable working with animals

volunteer_opportunities.title: Park Cleanup Volunteer
volunteer_opportunities.description: Help pick up litter and maintain a local park
volunteer_opportunities.requirements: Must be able to bend and lift
